meanings.definition: Weighing more than is usual, required, or healthy.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised the man to exercise regularly to avoid becoming overweight.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about her overweight body and decided to make healthier food choices.
meanings.sent3: The overweight cat struggled to fit through the small pet door, much to the amusement of its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack was so heavy that it felt like an overweight elephant was sitting on her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The balloon, filled with too much air, floated awkwardly like an overweight cloud in the sky.

meanings.sent1: His doctor warned him about the health risks associated with his overweight.
meanings.sent2: The overweight of the luggage caused the suitcase to burst open at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The overweight of the cake made it impossible for the tiny mouse to carry it away.
meanings.sent4: The overweight of responsibilities on her shoulders felt like a heavy burden to bear.
meanings.sent5: The overweight of sadness in her heart weighed her down like a ton of bricks.
